Package org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IContainer
    Interface used to retrieve the status of a given Container
    IContainerAware
    The interface describes methods to be called when the Container is being created/destroyed
    IContainerListener
    The interface describes methods used to retrieve the status of a given Container
    IContainerLocalListener
    The interface describes methods used to publish the changes to a given Container configuration to listeners on the local cluster node only.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actions Deprecated
    AdvertisedBandwidth  
    Bandwidth  
    Buffers  
    Capabilities  
    ComponentActivatorAbstractBase
    Abstract class which need to be subclassed in order to track and register dependencies per-container
    Config
    The class represents Admin Config status
    ContainerFlow
    Express a container flow
    ContainerServiceDependency
    Class representing a ServiceDependency on a container
    Description
    The class represents the Name property of an element.
    Edge
    Class that describe an Edge connecting two NodeConnector, the edge is directed because there is the tail and the head concept which implies a direction.
    EdgeTest  
    ForwardingMode
    The class represents the forwarding mode property of a node.
    Host  
    Latency  
    MacAddress
    The class contains MAC address property.
    Name
    The class represents the Name property of an element.
    Node
    Describe a generic network element in multiple SDNs technologies.
    Node.NodeIDType
    Enum-like static class created with the purpose of identifing multiple type of nodes in the SDN network.
    NodeConnector
    Describe a generic network element attachment points, attached to one Node, the NodeConnector is formed by the pair (NodeConnectorType, NodeConnectorID) because each SDN technology can identify an attachment point on the Node in different way.
    NodeConnector.NodeConnectorIDType
    Enumerate the different types of NodeConnectors supported by the class
    NodeConnectorTest  
    NodeTable  
    NodeTable.NodeTableIDType
    Enum-like static class created with the purpose of identifing multiple type of nodes in the SDN network.
    NodeTableTest  
    NodeTest  
    Path
    Describe a path as a sequence of Edge such that from each of its Head Node there is an link to the next Tail Node in the sequence
    PathTest  
    PeerBandwidth  
    Property
    Abstract base class for a Property that can be attached to any sal core element
    PropertyTest  
    State
    The class represents the State property of an Edge
    SupportedBandwidth  
    Tables  
    Tier
    The class represents the Tier property of a node
    TimeStamp
